en.answer: The effect of Number 70: Malevolent Sin that increases its ATK and Rank can be activated at the end of the Damage Step when it attacks, not only when it attacks a monster but also when it attacks directly.
en.question: If Number 70: Malevolent Sin attacks my opponent directly, can I still activate its effect at the end of the Damage Step that increases its ATK and Rank?
